mapper.insert: insert into basic_space (pkid, typeid, name, address, sortnum, capacity, createtime, remark,classid,unitid) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{capacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update basic_space set typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unitid = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, typeid, name, address, sortnum, capacity, createtime, remark,classid,unitid from basic_space
select pkid, typeid, name, address, sortnum, capacity, createtime, remark,classid,unitid from basic_space WHERE classid=#{0} limit 1
